summary: Roses are beautiful flowering plants or the flowers they produce. There are many types, with over 300 species and countless cultivated varieties. They can grow as shrubs, climbers, or trailers, often with thorny stems. Rose flowers come in various sizes, shapes, and colors, from white to yellow and red. Most roses come from Asia, with some from Europe, North America, and Africa. People grow roses for their lovely appearance and often pleasant scent. They can be small or grow very tall.
title: Rose
